channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国最新的长征火箭将在创纪录的任务年首次亮相
item.description: China's Long March 12, capable of sending bigger satellites with more functionalities into the Earth's orbit, is expected to make its debut flight in 2024, in a year of record launch missions for the country, state media reported on Monday.翻译:据官方媒体周一报道，中国的长征十二号能够将更大、功能更多的卫星送入地球轨道，预计将于 2024 年首次飞行，今年是中国发射任务创纪录的一年。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着券商开始关注中国需求，亚玛芬体育股价上涨
item.description: Shares of Amer Sports rose about 7% before the bell on Monday as brokerages started coverage of the company's stock, with analysts focusing on strong demand for its outdoor and sportswear products in China.翻译:周一收盘前，Amer Sports 股价上涨约 7%，券商开始关注该公司的股票，分析师关注中国对其户外和运动服装产品的强劲需求。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，印度考虑对低品位铁矿石征收出口税
item.description: India is considering an export tax on low-grade iron ore after small steel producers urged the government to curb its overseas sales, two sources directly involved in the matter said.翻译:两名直接参与此事的消息人士称，在小型钢铁生产商敦促政府限制其海外销售后，印度正在考虑对低品位铁矿石征收出口税。
item.author: Neha Arora

item.title: 随着中国竞争对手的扩张，雷诺在日内瓦的欧洲电动汽车防御中处于领先地位
item.description: Renault and China-owned MG launched new electrified cars in Europe at the Geneva car show on Monday as Chinese automakers seek to take more market share from legacy European rivals.翻译:雷诺和中资名爵周一在日内瓦车展上在欧洲推出了新款电动汽车，中国汽车制造商寻求从欧洲传统竞争对手手中夺取更多市场份额。
item.author: Gilles Guillaume, Nick Carey

item.title: 早盘竞价：随着个人消费支出 (PCE) 的出现，蓬勃发展的股市回落
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 1月份中资银行通过客户掉期购买美元创历史新高
item.description: Chinese banks purchased the most dollars from their clients via FX swaps in January, official data from the FX regulator showed on Monday, suggesting exporters preferred to only temporarily acquire the local currency while holding on to dollars.翻译:外汇监管机构周一公布的官方数据显示，一月份，中国的银行通过外汇掉期从客户那里购买了最多的美元，这表明出口商更愿意在持有美元的同时暂时购买当地货币。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国国产C919飞机在新加坡航展后降落越南
item.description: China's homegrown C919 passenger jet, manufactured by Commercial Aviation Corp of China (COMAC), landed in Vietnam on Monday, its second international destination after Singapore, Chinese state television CCTV reported.翻译:据中国国家电视台中央电视台报道，中国商用航空集团公司（COMAC）制造的中国本土C919客机周一降落在越南，这是其继新加坡之后的第二个国际目的地。
item.author: Sophie Yu, Brenda Goh

item.title: 上汽名爵面向欧洲市场推出MG3混合动力车型
item.description: MG Motors, a unit of China's SAIC on Monday unveiled its hybrid hatchback MG3 model for the European market, taking advantage of slowing growth demand for electric vehicles by offering a lower-emission model without the need for charging.翻译:中国上汽集团旗下的名爵汽车周一向欧洲市场推出了混合动力掀背车 MG3 车型，利用电动汽车需求增长放缓的机会，推出无需充电的低排放车型。
item.author: Gilles Guillaume

item.title: 中国企业因上市审查而取消IPO计划
item.description: Companies have scrambled to scuttle plans for initial public offering in China this year as the securities watchdog tightens rules on share listings in a bearish market.翻译:随着证券监管机构在熊市中收紧股票上市规则，中国企业纷纷放弃今年在中国的首次公开募股计划。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国反击美国、欧盟和英国对中国企业实施与俄罗斯有关的限制
item.description: China firmly opposes the decisions of Britain, the European Union and the United States to impose sanctions on its companies for Russia-related reasons, its commerce ministry said on Monday.翻译:中国商务部周一表示，中方坚决反对英国、欧盟和美国因涉俄原因对中国企业实施制裁的决定。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：卫星图像显示南海有争议环礁口漂浮屏障
item.description: Satellite images of the hotly disputed Scarborough Shoal in the South China Sea show a new floating barrier across its entrance, near where Philippine ships and China coast guard vessels have had frequent run-ins.翻译:南海争议激烈的斯卡伯勒浅滩的卫星图像显示，其入口处有一个新的浮动屏障，菲律宾船只和中国海警船只经常发生冲突的地方附近。
item.author: Greg Torode, Karen Lema

item.title: 官员称美国海岸警卫队在基里巴斯附近登上中国渔船
item.description: The U.S. Coast Guard and Kiribati police boarded two Chinese fishing boats during a patrol against illegal fishing in the Pacific Islands nation's vast exclusive economic zone this month but found no issues aboard, a coast guard official said.翻译:一名海岸警卫队官员表示，美国海岸警卫队和基里巴斯警方本月在这个太平洋岛国广阔的专属经济区巡逻打击非法捕鱼活动时登上了两艘中国渔船，但没有发现船上存在任何问题。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 俄罗斯财长表示正在与中国就人民币贷款进行谈判
item.description: Russia's finance ministry has been discussing with its Chinese counterparts the possibility of taking out loans in yuan, but there has been no decision yet, Russian Finance Minister Anton Siluanov told state media in remarks published on Monday.翻译:俄罗斯财政部长安东·西卢阿诺夫在周一发表的讲话中对官方媒体表示，俄罗斯财政部一直在与中国财政部讨论以人民币发放贷款的可能性，但尚未做出决定。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 据彭博社报道，蚂蚁集团以高于 Citadel 的价格收购瑞士信贷中国业务
item.description: Fintech giant Ant Group has outbid billionaire Ken Griffin's Citadel Securities for Credit Suisse's investment bank venture in China, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday, adding it was unclear whether the Chinese company's offer would succeed.翻译:据彭博社周日报道，金融科技巨头蚂蚁集团已以超过亿万富翁 Ken Griffin 的 Citadel 证券的出价收购瑞士信贷在中国的投资银行业务，并补充说目前尚不清楚这家中国公司的报价是否会成功。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美元在通胀数据泛滥之前走低
item.description: The dollar inched lower on Monday ahead of a macro-packed week that could shed more light on the global rate outlook, with a U.S. inflation reading taking centre stage.翻译:美元周一小幅走低，接下来的宏观宏观一周可能会给全球利率前景带来更多启示，其中美国通胀数据成为焦点。
item.author: Amanda Cooper

item.title: 通胀测试迫在眉睫，世界股市刚刚脱离历史高位
item.description: World shares stalled just below record highs on Monday as investors awaited inflation data from the United States and euro zone that could further refine interest rate expectations.翻译:周一，世界股市停滞在略低于历史高位的水平，因投资者等待美国和欧元区的通胀数据，这些数据可能进一步改善利率预期。
item.author: Yoruk Bahceli

item.title: 商务部长表示中国寻求加强与新西兰在CPTPP方面的合作
item.description: China is willing to work with New Zealand to continue strengthening cooperation in the process of joining The Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, its commerce minister said.翻译:中国商务部长表示，中方愿同新方在加入《全面且进步的跨太平洋伙伴关系协定》进程中继续加强合作。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国称已在金门附近海域进行巡逻
item.description: China's Fujian coast guard conducted patrols in waters near Kinmen on Feb. 25, China Coast Guard said.翻译:中国海警局称，2月25日，中国福建海警在金门附近海域进行巡逻。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 面对中国电动汽车竞争对手，欧洲汽车制造商在成本上挤压供应商
item.description: Europe's automakers and their already-stretched suppliers face a tough year as they race to cut costs for electric models to counter leaner Chinese rivals which are bringing cheaper vehicles to challenge them on their home turf.翻译:欧洲汽车制造商及其本已捉襟见肘的供应商面临着艰难的一年，因为他们竞相削减电动车型的成本，以对抗规模较小的中国竞争对手，而中国竞争对手正在推出更便宜的汽车来挑战他们的主场。
item.author: Nick Carey

item.title: 瑞士怀疑俄罗斯是否会参加乌克兰和平峰会
item.description: Russia is unlikely to take part at the outset of a high-level Ukraine peace conference which neutral Switzerland plans to host in the coming months, Swiss President Viola Amherd was quoted as saying by a newspaper on Saturday.翻译:一家报纸周六援引瑞士总统维奥拉·阿赫德的话说，俄罗斯不太可能参加中立的瑞士计划在未来几个月主办的乌克兰高级别和平会议。
item.author: Reuters
